name: GreatApp for Mines Game
description:
The object of the game is to clear an abstract minefield without detonating a mine.


FEATURES:
- 3 difficulty levels
- Offline high score
- Flag tiles with long click

DIFFICULTIES:
- Beginner 8x8 with 5 mines
- Intermediate 8x8 with 10 mines
- Expert 8x8 with 15 mines
